## Sources

I found three useful dataset hosts; they are NYTimes, Our World in Data and JHU CSSEGIS 

* Nytimes' github is [nytimes/covid-19-data](https://github.com/nytimes/covid-19-data/)
* JHU CSSEGIS' github is [CSSEGISandData/COVID-19](https://github.com/CSSEGISandData/COVID-19/)
* Our World in Data's github is [owid/covid-19-data](https://github.com/owid/covid-19-data)

<br /> <br />
